LanguageData.Mote_FecalBit.label: mote
LanguageData.BionicBladder.label: bionic bladder
LanguageData.BionicBladder.description: An advanced artificial bladder. A chemical recycling system breaks down waste products from the body into molecules which are recycled with the remainder released as gas, the downside of this being that it gives the user gas.
LanguageData.HygieneEnhancer.label: hygiene enhancer
LanguageData.HygieneEnhancer.description: Releases mechanites that break down dead skin cells and other detritus on the skin and hair releasing it harmlessly into the air.
LanguageData.sewagePipeStuff.label: plumbing
LanguageData.plumbingValve.label: plumbing valve
LanguageData.plumbingValve.description: Opens or closes connections between pipes.
LanguageData.airPipe.label: air-con pipe
LanguageData.ToiletStallDoor.label: stall door
LanguageData.ToiletStallDoor.description: Thin door which only blocks line of sight to people using bathroom fixtures. Does not create new rooms or prevent heat loss.
LanguageData.PitLatrine.label: latrine
LanguageData.PitLatrine.description: A pit latrine that collects faeces in a hole in the ground. Must be emptied manually, or can be plumbed.\n14L per use
LanguageData.PrimitiveWell.label: primitive well
LanguageData.PrimitiveWell.description: Accesses ground water. Water must be hauled to a water tub before it can be used for washing or drinking.
LanguageData.WashBucket.label: water tub
LanguageData.WashBucket.description: Tub of water used for personal hygiene. Must be regularly refilled with fresh water, also fills with rain water. Can also be used for drinking if thirst is enabled.
LanguageData.WaterTrough.label: Water Trough
LanguageData.WaterTrough.description: Trough of water used by animals, a service box with a ballcock valve automatically refills the water when the level is low, also refills in rain.
LanguageData.PetWaterBowl.label: Water Bowl
LanguageData.PetWaterBowl.description: Bowl of water used by animals.
LanguageData.LitterBox.label: litter box
LanguageData.LitterBox.description: An indoor faeces and urine collection box for small animals.
LanguageData.BurnPit.label: burn pit
LanguageData.BurnPit.description: Eliminates fecal sludge by burning it as fuel. Can also be used for disposing of corpses or other detritus. Colonists may become sick if they spend too long near burning waste.
LanguageData.BasinStuff.description: Clean and simple bathroom basin for keeping your hands clean after using the toilet.
LanguageData.BasinStuff.label: basin
LanguageData.Fountain.description: A water fountain used for drinking and washing.
LanguageData.Fountain.label: fountain
LanguageData.KitchenSink.description: Everything but a kitchen sink. Increases room cleanliness.
LanguageData.KitchenSink.label: kitchen sink
LanguageData.ToiletStuff.description: Sanitation fixture used for the disposal of human urine and faeces.\n14L per use
LanguageData.ToiletStuff.label: toilet
LanguageData.ToiletAdvStuff.description: Comfortable, self cleaning, unblockable, super efficient smart toilet. Provides the optimum multi-functional experience with automatic cleansing and deodorization.\n7L per use
LanguageData.ToiletAdvStuff.label: smart toilet
LanguageData.BathMat.label: Bath Mat
LanguageData.BathMat.description: A small mat used next to a bathtub to absorb water.
LanguageData.BathtubStuff.description: Slow to use, but very comfortable. Can be heated by placing an adjacent campfire or log boiler, or via plumbed hot water tanks. Does not require a sewage outlet.\n190L per wash
LanguageData.BathtubStuff.label: bathtub
LanguageData.ShowerStuff.description: Simple shower. Requires water from water towers. Can be heated via plumbed hot water tanks. Does not require a sewage outlet.\n65L per wash
LanguageData.ShowerStuff.label: shower
LanguageData.ShowerSimple.description: Simple shower. Requires water from water towers. Can be heated via plumbed hot water tanks. Does not require a sewage outlet.\n65L per wash
LanguageData.ShowerSimple.label: simple shower
LanguageData.ShowerAdvStuff.description: Heats water on demand and does not need a hot water tank, cleans twice as fast\n90L per wash
LanguageData.ShowerAdvStuff.label: power shower
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool.description: Swimming pool used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, or pleasure. Must be filled with water from water towers first.
LanguageData.DBHSwimmingPool.label: swimming pool
LanguageData.HotTub.description: Hot tub used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, or pleasure. Filled with water from water towers on first use. Self-heated and does not require a sewage outlet.
LanguageData.HotTub.label: hot tub
LanguageData.WashingMachine.label: washing machine
LanguageData.WashingMachine.description: Washes clothes so well that you can't even tell someone died wearing it!
LanguageData.DBHSaunaHeaterLog.label: Fueled Sauna Heater
LanguageData.DBHSaunaHeaterLog.description: A heater designed specifically for creating a sauna room, using a sauna regularly reduces the risk of heart attacks, heats a room to 60c.
LanguageData.DBHSaunaHeaterElec.label: Electric Sauna Heater
LanguageData.DBHSaunaHeaterElec.description: A heater designed specifically for creating a sauna room, using a sauna regularly reduces the risk of heart attacks, heats a room to 60c.
LanguageData.DBHSaunaSeating.label: Sauna seating
LanguageData.WaterWellInlet.label: water well
LanguageData.WaterWellInlet.description: Accesses ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. The presence of sewage or other pollution will reduce water quality and can cause contamination.
LanguageData.DeepWaterWellInlet.label: deep water well
LanguageData.DeepWaterWellInlet.description: Accesses a large area of ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. Deep wells are unaffected by pollution.
LanguageData.WaterButt.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained.
LanguageData.WaterButt.label: water butt
LanguageData.WaterTowerS.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained.
LanguageData.WaterTowerS.label: water tower
LanguageData.WaterTowerL.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained.
LanguageData.WaterTowerL.label: huge water tower
LanguageData.WindPump.label: wind pump
LanguageData.WindPump.description: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 3000 L/day.
LanguageData.ElectricPump.label: electric pump
LanguageData.ElectricPump.description: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 1500 L/day.
LanguageData.PumpingStation.label: pumping station
LanguageData.PumpingStation.description: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 10000 L/day.
LanguageData.SewageOutlet.label: sewage outlet
LanguageData.SewageOutlet.description: Can be placed anywhere. Sewage will pool and spread on land or disperse in water. Sewage cleans up over time; the presence of trees, water, or rain will speed this up.
LanguageData.SewageSepticTank.label: septic tank
LanguageData.SewageSepticTank.description: Slowly cleans sewage over time. Sewage is directed to septic tanks first. If it reaches full capacity, excess sewage is sent to sewage outlets.
LanguageData.SewageTreatment.label: sewage treatment
LanguageData.SewageTreatment.description: Slowly cleans sewage over time. If it reaches full capacity then excess sewage is sent directly to sewage outlets without treatment.
LanguageData.WaterTreatment.label: water treatment
LanguageData.WaterTreatment.description: Cleans 99.99% of germs! Filters existing water in storage towers, and any water used by fixtures, eliminating the risk of disease.
LanguageData.Thermostat.label: thermostat
LanguageData.Thermostat.description: Used to control electric and gas boilers. More than one can be placed. Connects via standard plumbing.
LanguageData.LogBoiler.label: log boiler
LanguageData.LogBoiler.description: Produces 2000 heating units for piped radiators and hot water tanks. Heats the room and adjacent baths. Requires wood logs for fuel.
LanguageData.GasBoiler.label: gas boiler
LanguageData.GasBoiler.description: Produces 2000 heating units for radiators and hot water tanks. Requires chemfuel for fuel. Can be controlled by thermostats.
LanguageData.ElectricBoiler.label: electric boiler
LanguageData.ElectricBoiler.description: Produces a variable amount of heating units for radiators and hot water tanks. Manually controlled power setting. Can be controlled by thermostats.
LanguageData.SolarHeater.label: solar heater
LanguageData.SolarHeater.description: Uses sunlight to heat hot water tanks and radiators. 0-2000 units of heating power depending on light level and ambient temperature.
LanguageData.GeothermHeater.label: Geothermal heater
LanguageData.GeothermHeater.description: Uses geothermal heat to heat hot water tanks and radiators. 3700 units of heating.
LanguageData.HotWaterTank.label: hot water tank
LanguageData.HotWaterTank.description: Stores hot running water for showers and baths. Connect to any boiler to heat.
LanguageData.RadiatorStuffed.description: Heats rooms using hot water from boilers. Requires 100 heating units.
LanguageData.RadiatorStuffed.label: radiator
LanguageData.RadiatorLarge.description: Three times the output of a standard radiator. Useful for larger rooms. Requires 300 heating units.
LanguageData.RadiatorLarge.label: large radiator
LanguageData.RadiatorTowelRail.label: Towel Rail
LanguageData.CeilingFan.description: Cools a room by circulating air. Includes a built-in lamp.
LanguageData.CeilingFan.label: ceiling fan 2x2
LanguageData.CeilingFanS.description: Cools a room by circulating air. Includes a built-in lamp.
LanguageData.CeilingFanS.label: ceiling fan 1x1
LanguageData.AirConOutdoorUnit.label: air-con outdoor unit
LanguageData.AirConOutdoorUnit.description: Multi-split air conditioner unit. Place outdoors and pipe to indoor units or freezer units. Power mode selection with 100-1000 cooling units capacity.
LanguageData.AirconIndoorUnit.label: air-con indoor unit
LanguageData.AirconIndoorUnit.description: Indoor air-con unit for rooms. Connect to outdoor air-con units. Requires 100 cooling units.
LanguageData.FreezerUnit.label: walk-in freezer unit
LanguageData.FreezerUnit.description: Freezer unit for creating a walk-in freezer. Connect to outdoor air-con units. Requires 300 cooling units.
LanguageData.IrrigationSprinkler.label: irrigation sprinkler
LanguageData.IrrigationSprinkler.description: Waters the surrounding area once every morning to improve the fertility of the soil through the day. Uses 1000L each morning at max radius.
LanguageData.FireSprinkler.label: fire sprinkler
LanguageData.FireSprinkler.description: Triggered by fire or high temperature. Douses flames with a spray of water.
LanguageData.BiosolidsComposter.label: biosolids composter
LanguageData.BiosolidsComposter.description: A composter for turning sewage into fertilizer for increasing the fertility of diggable terrain.
LanguageData.BedPan.label: bed pan
LanguageData.BedPan.description: A receptacle used by a bedridden patient for urine and faeces.
LanguageData.Biosolids.label: biosolids
LanguageData.Biosolids.description: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes biosolids that offer a small boost to terrain fertility. Useful for harsh environments with limited space to grow. Biosolids also produce a large boost to the fertility of sand which can make it fertile when combined with irrigation.
LanguageData.FecalSludge.label: fecal sludge
LanguageData.FecalSludge.description: A barrel filled with fecal sludge. Can be dumped, burned, or composted into biosolids.
LanguageData.DBH_WaterBottle.label: water
LanguageData.FilthUrine.label: urine
LanguageData.FilthFaeces.label: faeces
LanguageData.RawSewage.label: raw sewage
